name: 翻譯教學
description: 雖然過去幾十年來翻譯研究已逐漸登上學術殿堂的門檻，但對翻譯教學議題的探討仍僻處邊陲，從事研究的人寥寥可數，不論在理論架構、教學實務和研究方法上皆仍缺乏足夠的論述和研究成果，難以符應實際課堂的需求。因此本課程旨在探討翻譯的理論認知、教學方法和研究訓練，讓同學對翻譯教學的理論、目標、方法、教材和評量方式不再基於個人直覺經驗，而能具備論述基礎和實務技能來從事課程設計、教案撰寫、與翻譯教學方法和評量等。
goals: 翻譯教學的理論、目標、方法、教材和評量
syllabus:
授課方式：16+2週：彈性教學授課方式以學生自主學習和撰寫研究專題報告為主。

Current translation teaching programs in Taiwan operate under a major hardship: the lack of clear objectives, materials, teaching approaches, and assessment methods. The translation courses are usually not based on a coherent set of teaching principles derived from knowledge about the nature of translation processes and the effects of classroom instruction. Thus, this course aims to provide you with a systematic elaboration of the issues underlying translation pedagogy. Throughout this semester, you will be given various oral and written assignments. Particularly, you will be asked to report to the class about research articles of varying topics in the area of translation pedagogy. After this course, you are expected to learn curricular design, lesson planning, case studies for translation pedagogy, and suggestions on how to teach and assess translation skills in your classroom.
